about_the_game:
Solve puzzles to find your way out of the room before it is too late - Something lurks deep in the shadows. Welcome to a place where everything you ever imagined can be true, even your worst nightmare.

Note: The game does not have roomscale mechanics or hands interaction for the Vive yet, we are still in early access collecting feedback and developing and improving the game towards a better game experience.

“Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.” - Lewis Caroll

“Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.”
― Lewis Carroll, Alice in Wonderland

The Rabbit Hole is an immersive, intense and mind-bending game built for Virtual Reality.

The Rabbit Hole is an episodic game that will be further explored with more levels and content down the road, this version contains the DEMO of the first game level called "The Old Room", which contains;

❏ 5 minutes of intense escape the room experience in Virtual Reality
❏ A Dark Environment Built With Unreal 4
❏ Room exploration with collectibles and logical thinking to find the way out
❏ The Room evolves and get darker and darker as you push forward, experience The Old Room in three different layouts: Night, Day and Nightmare (FULL VERSION).
❏ Change your size with potions mechanics to find and explore new places.
❏ Play 2 of 5 unique puzzles challenges in the demo (All five available in FULL VERSION Game)
❏ Incredible virtual sound effects

name: The Rabbit Hole Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: This game requires an VR headset, One USB 2.0 or faster port, HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2, or better

short_description: You find yourself in a strange place, a place full of darkness and mad things. After falling down the rabbit hole, what mysteries lies beyond? Are you ready to escape it? Be fast, be smart and survive this grim reality!
